Sample Message on Notice of Assessment: This is an estimated tax assessment as we have not received your estimate of chargeable income/ Form C/ Form C-S etc. If you disagree with the assessment, object via Revise/ Object to Assessment at mytax.iras.gov.sg within 2 months.
Objection Required?: Yes, if you do not agree with the tax assessment
